BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't quote me on this, but I heard there
are strange ruins in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

And by "strange," I mean "<clr:0000>ring-shaped<clr:ffff>."
Who ever heard of such a thing?

I know that since the Upheaval, there's
been no shortage of strange sightings
and wacky discoveries.
But <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins<clr:ffff>? Can you get more
bizarre than that?
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>With all the monsters around, I really
shouldn't continue any farther.

I think instead I'll go to <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
to see those <clr:0000>ring-shaped ruins <clr:ffff>I've been
hearing so much about.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Whew... They told me this was monster
territory, but I didn't listen. Guess this is
what you call "learning the hard way."
Unless I want a date with death, I'd better
not go any farther.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You know, <clr:0000>Kakariko Village <clr:ffff>isn't too far.
Maybe I'll head there instead.

That'll give me a chance to check out the
ring-shaped ruins everyone talks about.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Oh, hey, kid.<sp:5:0:0> Keep your eyes peeled
around these parts, OK?

The <clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands <clr:ffff>have been the
<clr:0000>monsters' turf <clr:ffff>for a long time, so there
are lots of creeps hanging around.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I heard some of them even set up camp
in the <clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>nearby.<sp:5:0:0>

If you're going that way, you'd better be
ready for things to get ugly!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>We're just <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff> right
now.<sp:5:0:0> You, uh, have heard of it, right, kid?
The watery city where the <clr:0000>Zora<clr:ffff> live?
I've heard it's a gorgeous place. Beautiful,
sparkling stonework everywhere you look.
Definitely on my list of places to see.
I ran into a Hylian once who was on his
way there to see a Zora vai...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>It just warmed my heart!<sp:5:1:0> Isn't it wonderful
that people from such different cultural
backgrounds can become friends?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hope he made it to her safely. <sp:5:0:0>Sounds
like the road to <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff> has
crumbled and no one can get across.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>A long time ago I saw a voe coming out of
a cave, completely drenched.

I was amazed. <sp:5:0:0>How had he gotten so
thoroughly soaked?

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Come to think of it, I have heard rumors
of a <clr:0000>cave that had rain falling inside it<clr:ffff>...
Near_RainPoint_01: This rain! When will it end?
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Unconscious_01>That thing is not to be messed around
with! You hear me? Stay away from it!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Oh! I thought I was doomed.


If not for you, kid, I hate to think how that
might've ended... <sp:5:0:0>Almost definitely with
me in the ground.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>You can reach <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff> by going
<clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> of here.

I hear the road's run-down though,
so if you do head that way, be ready
for a difficult journey.
SavedLv3_01: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That was close.<sp:5:1:0> I owe you, kid. <sp:5:0:0>Sarqso.
Near_GoRange_02: I hope that voe is OK.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I don't have much to offer you, but I do
have this.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You ever tried busting open one of those
<clr:0000>splash fruits<clr:ffff>?

If you hit 'em or smash them against
something, water comes splashing out!

You can use them to put out fires or cool
yourself down on a hot day. If you ask me,
they're essential for travel.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Say... That pitch wasn't half bad! Perhaps
I have a future in fruit vending.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I got caught flat-footed.<sp:5:0:0> Good thing you
came when you did.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm on this journey to find a partner, but
the real joy has been meeting all these
different people along the way!
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Though I've met a lot fewer since more
monsters started showing up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>But hey, did you hear about those strange
<clr:0000>ruins<clr:ffff> in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>?

I bet they're drawing a huge crowd, and
you know what crowds are full of?

Potential suitors, kid. And maybe my voe!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Wow... <sp:5:1:0>You look like you've done that
before!<sp:5:1:0> Save a lot of people, do you?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Rumor has it some strange <clr:0000>ring-shaped
ruins <clr:ffff>were excavated in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

Don't believe me? See for yourself!
The village is <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>of here.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Unconscious_01>Ugh... <sp:5:0:0>I was so distracted worrying I'd
lose that I lost!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Sarqso, kid...<sp:5:0:0> Not that it seemed like
much of a challenge.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>What a shameful defeat...<sp:5:0:0> Kid, don't look
at me. <sp:5:1:0>I don't want to be seen like this.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Right on time, kid!<sp:5:0:0> You gonna stand there
or you gonna lend me a hand?
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Splash fruits <clr:ffff>are super useful. You should
always pick them up when you find them.<sp:0:4:0>Then you'll have water whenever and
wherever you need it!
Near_Thunder: I don't want to get struck!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>With those strange <clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Kakariko
Village<clr:ffff>, there are likely to be lots of
people there now.
I wonder how many of them are
unattached...
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, kid! Wanted to shelter from the rain?
That makes two of us.

We might as well have a chat while we
wring ourselves dry, eh?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>The sound of rain reminds me of a voe
I once met.

He was coming out of a cave, and he
looked drenched. When I asked why,
he said, "It was pouring in there!"
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>It turns out some <clr:0000>caves have rain
falling inside<clr:ffff>! You believe that?

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Here I thought caves were where you
went to get dry on rainy days, not to get
wet on clear ones.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>Rumor has it that there are monsters
camped out in the <clr:0000>ruins <clr:ffff>nearby.<sp:5:0:0>

Tread carefully around here, OK, kid?
You're in the <clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>This is
monster territory.
